# Overview and Motivation

*This is the final project report for Fall 2017 [Data Science I](http://datasciencelabs.github.io/) (BST 260) at [Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health](https://www.hsph.harvard.edu/) on the relationships between the use of Electronic Health Records (EHR) and provider demographics, separately among the eligible professionals (EPs) and eligible hospitals participating in the [2016 Medicare & Medicaid EHR Incentive Program](https://www.cms.gov/Regulations-and-Guidance/Legislation/EHRIncentivePrograms/2016ProgramRequirements.html) across the United States. Enjoy!*
